item.title: Academic: the website builder for Hugo
item.description: Create a free website with Academic using Markdown, Jupyter, or RStudio. Choose a beautiful color theme and build anything with the Page Builder - over 40 widgets, themes, and language packs included! Check out the latest demo of what you’ll get in less than 10 minutes, or view the showcase of personal, project, and business sites. Setup Academic Get Started View the documentation Ask a question Request a feature or report a bug Updating?
